metadata.title: CVE-2021-47364 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: comedi:Fix memory leak in compat_insnlist() `compat_insnlist()` handles the 32-bitversion of the `COMEDI_INSNLIST` ioctl (whenwhen `CONFIG_COMPAT` isenabled). It allocates memory to temporarily hold an array of `structcomedi_insn` converted from the 32-bit version in user space. This memoryis only being freed if there is a fault while filling the array, otherwiseit is leaked. Add a call to `kfree()` to fix the leak.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
